    • Constructor Detail

      • Policy

        public Policy(java.lang.String aPolicyNo,
              int aYearOfIssue)
       throws IllegalPolicyException
        constructing the basic details of a policy which are common to all policies
        Parameters:
        aPolicyNo - a given policy no. to be given to the new policy
        aYearOfIssue - a given year of issue to be given to the new policy
        Throws:
        IllegalPolicyException - in case the given date is not between 1990 and 2013 and if the given policy no. is not of correct format

        a method to update the year of issue of this policy
        Parameters:
        aYearOfIssue - a year of issue to replace the existing one
        Throws:
